code: @Manual{,   title = {PEcAn.JULES: PEcAn Package for Integration of the JULES Model},   author = {Mike Dietze},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.7.5},   url = {https://pecanproject.github.io}, }

what: PEcAn Package for Integration of the JULES Model
title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the JULES Model
text: Download JULES source code https://jules.jchmr.org/software--documentation/previous-releases/jules-v4.2 Download FCM Configure netCDF modify following settings save Compile Run test example Add local executable BETY database Create new File record relevant machine File name = jules.exe File path = /path//jules/build/bin Got Model search version JULES running (currently 4.2) Edit Record > View Related Files search File record just created order link new model executable existing Model record Go PEcAn web interface verify correct JULES version shows pull menu
code: wget https://github.com/metomi/fcm/archive/2015.05.0.tar.gz tar -xvzf 2015.05.0.tar.gz cd jules-vn4.2/etc/fcm-make/ vi make.cfg # NetCDF settings $JULES_NETCDF{?} = actual $JULES_NETCDF_PATH{?} = /usr cd ../.. ../fcm-2015.05.0/bin/fcm make -f etc/fcm-make/make.cfg --new cd examples/point_loobos ../../build/bin/jules.exe

what: Detect timestep of JULES met files — detect.timestep

Detect timestep of JULES met files — detect.timestep
text: met.dir path directory containing met files met.regexp pattern match find met file met.dir. one file matches, first used. start_date file start checking deltas. used timestep can detected CDF header.

PEcAn.JULES 1.7.5
text: model2netcdf.JULES longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.JULES 1.7.4
text: PEcAn.JULES now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.

title: PEcAn.JULES 1.7.1
